Package model

Class ImageDisplayModel

java.lang.Object
model.ImageDisplayModel
public class ImageDisplayModel extends Object
Class that tries to read custom images for all the playing cards, linking images to set names in a hashmap making it easier to use them later.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ImageDisplayModel()
    Creates a ImageDisplayModel object where all custom images for the playing cards are read and linked to a specific given name in a hashmap.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Image
    getImageFromName​(String name)
    Given the name linked with an read image, return the image from the hashmap.
    Image
    getScaledImageInstanceFromName​(String name, int labelWidth, int labelHeight)
    Given the name linked with an read image, scale it according to given width and height before returning the image.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageDisplayModel

      public ImageDisplayModel()
      Creates a ImageDisplayModel object where all custom images for the playing cards are read and linked to a specific given name in a hashmap.

  • Method Details

    • getImageFromName

      public Image getImageFromName​(String name)
      Given the name linked with an read image, return the image from the hashmap.
      Parameters:
      name - The specificly given name that associate with a read image.
      Returns:
      The image that was linked with given name.

    • getScaledImageInstanceFromName

      public Image getScaledImageInstanceFromName​(String name, int labelWidth, int labelHeight)
      Given the name linked with an read image, scale it according to given width and height before returning the image.
      Parameters:
      name - The specificly given name that associate with a read image.
      labelWidth - The wanted width of the image.
      labelHeight - The wanted height of the image.
      Returns:
      The scaled image that was linked with given name.
